sentences.en: A few days later his badly beaten body was discovered on a roadside outside the city.
sentences.cn: 几天后，他的尸体在城外的路边被发现，身上有被严重殴打过的痕迹。

sentences.en: Bob was forced to leave the car at the roadside and run for help.
sentences.cn: 鲍勃被迫把车停在路边，然后跑去求助了。

sentences.en: He slept the night in a roadside inn.
sentences.cn: 他在一家路边小店过的夜.

sentences.en: It's not safe to travel by standing at the roadside hoping to be picked up by passing motorists.
sentences.cn: 站在路边等着搭便车,这样旅行并不安全.

sentences.en: Paramedics treated the injured at the roadside.
sentences.cn: 护理人员在路旁为受伤者做治疗。

sentences.en: Photographs taken by roadside cameras will soon be enough to prosecute drivers for speeding.
sentences.cn: 路边电子眼拍下的照片很快将足以起诉超速的司机。

sentences.en: Roadside cafes are now a big part of the catering industry.
sentences.cn: 现在路边小餐馆构成了餐饮业很大一部分。

sentences.en: She exposed her unwanted baby by the roadside.
sentences.cn: 她将不想要的婴儿丢弃在路边.

sentences.en: The portals of the rich reek of flesh and wine while frozen bodies lie by the roadside.
sentences.cn: 朱门酒肉臭,路有冻死骨.

sentences.en: The snow along the roadside was six feet deep in places.
sentences.cn: 路边某些地方的积雪有六英尺深。

sentences.en: The snow was banked up along the roadside.
We disturbed a wild boar that had been foraging by the roadside.
sentences.cn: 我们惊动了一只一直在路边觅食的野猪。

sentences.en: We stood waiting by the roadside.

trans.tran_cn: 路边，路旁，路旁（的），路边（的）（树木等）
